verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%>. O <S%H7891>sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%>; for he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> marvellous <S%H6381>things<s%>: his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, hath gotten him the <S%H3467>victory<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath made <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation<s%>: his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> hath he openly <S%H1540>shewed<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>.

He hath <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and his <S%H530>truth<s%> toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>.
Make a joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: make a loud <S%H6476>noise<s%>, and <S%H7442>rejoice<s%>, and <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise.
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with the <S%H3658>harp<s%>; with the <S%H3658>harp<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H2172>psalm<s%>.
With <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H7782>cornet<s%> make a joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H4428>King<s%>.
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar<s%>, and the <S%H4393>fulness<s%> thereof; the <S%H8398>world<s%>, and they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.
Let the <S%H5104>floods<s%> <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%>: let the <S%H2022>hills<s%> be <S%H7442>joyful<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>

<S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for he <S%H935>cometh<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>: with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall he <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H4339>equity<s%>.
